bug.author: amruta01
bug.description: Unable to load heat map from the cache? When I rerun the heatmap, it says heatmap ... done! But I had to refresh the cash to render it

comments.comment: I'm also having trouble displaying a heat map. In my case, I'm seeing a message that says "Make this Notebook Trusted to load map: File -> Trust Notebook" however, there is no "File" button.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/amruta01>@amruta01</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/BKJackson>@BKJackson</denchmark-link> , Could you provide sample code that we can copy/paste and run to reproduce your issue?

Thanks folks.
We are good for now. We could fix the bug!
Best Regards, Beju
